Interface_name: HTTP client using cURL in PHP
Instruction:
Task Description: Create a PHP class that provides HTTP client functionality using cURL for making GET requests and downloading files from URLs.

Class Description: The HttpClient class encapsulates cURL functionality to perform HTTP GET requests and file downloads. It provides static methods for simple URL fetching and file downloading with proper error handling and resource management.

Attributes: (This class doesn't have any attributes as it only contains static methods)

Methods:

Method1: urlGet(string $url, bool $follow_location = true, int $timeout = 10) -> string|bool - Performs a GET request to the specified URL. Follows redirects by default and allows setting a timeout. Returns the response content or throws an exception on error.

Method2: fileGet(string $url, string $target) -> string|bool - Downloads a file from the specified URL and saves it to the target location. Returns the output or throws an exception on error. Uses a longer default timeout for file downloads.
